turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order for coffee to pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks in Chicago on South Michigan Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, you want a tall caffe latte with 2% milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me send your order to your preferred location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a tall caffe latte with 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks on south michigan avenue, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
